description: Part single, part two storey rear extension to garden flat
decision_conditions: <p>No part of the flat roof hereby approved shall be used as an external amenity area and shall only be accessed for maintenance purposes.&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: To safeguard the amenity of the neighbouring residents.&nbsp;</p>

<p>All new external facing and roofing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance.</p><p><br></p><p>

REASON: To protect the design character and appearance of the existing building and other buildings in the streetcene</p>
